name: Updater - The beginning
description:
UPDATER - The beginning

The journey just began for Player, the happy little pixel-art face you will embody in this Die & Retry Platformer.  

In a chaotic world where nothing is consistent, you must overcome many obstacles until you meet your destiny.  If you can go until the end, you can be proud.  

Many updates will come in the following years.   

The journey just began for Player
